text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; do { long long int n , max ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; long long int a [ n ] ; for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; max = a [ 0 ] ; for ( long long int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( max > a [ i ] ) { max = a [ i ] ; } } long long int sum = max * ( n - 1 ) ; t = t - 1 ; printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } while ( t > 0 ) ; return 0 ; }
